must-open-as-administrator: You must open this programm as an administrator to use it
confirm-logout: Do you really want to logout ?
login-url-opened: So we try to open a new web page in your favorite browser in order to log in, see you on the other side!
login-url-opened-warning: If we didn't achieve to open your browser, you can still copy paste the log in url...

installation.success-message: We just finished to write the image on your device, so you can use it now with your retrobox!
